description: An easy recipe that delivers loads of hearty flavour? This beef rissole and potato bake recipe ticks the boxes. This is a comforting, warming family meal.
name: 3-Ingredient Beef & Barbecue Sauce Rissoles With Potato Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Cook potato bake according to packet instructions.
Meanwhile, combine mince, breadcrumbs and 1/4 cup sauce in a medium bowl. Use 2 tablespoonfuls of mixture to make a total of 12 rissoles.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook rissoles for 4 minutes on each side or until browned and cooked through. Transfer rissoles to a large plate and cover to keep warm. Add remaining sauce and 1/4 cup cold water to pan. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring, or until slightly thickened. Return rissoles to pan and turn to coat in sauce mixture. Remove pan from heat.
Divide potato bake and rissoles among plates. Drizzle with sauce mixture and serve with beans.
